abi_url: Main Aave V3 liquidity pool proxy on Ethereum; manages deposits, borrows, and repayments.
Registry of pool addresses (upgradeable); holds references to Pool, Configurator, etc.
Manages listing & configuration of Aave V3 assets (reserves, collateral parameters).
Access Control manager for permissions (governance roles) in Aave V3.
Rewards distribution controller for Aave V3 (handles reward emissions to suppliers/borrowers).
Registry for Aave V2 core contract addresses:contentReference[oaicite:13]{index=13} (mainnet market). Provides the address of the active LendingPool.
Main Aave V2 liquidity pool proxy; handles user deposits, borrows, repayments (deprecated by V3).
Factory for Uniswap V2 pools (Pairs) on Ethereum; emits PairCreated events for each new pool.
Primary router for Uniswap V2 on Ethereum:contentReference[oaicite:21]{index=21} (provides swap/add liquidity functions).
Factory for Uniswap V3 pools on Ethereum:contentReference[oaicite:24]{index=24}; deploys new pools for each token pair & fee tier.
Uniswap V3 periphery SwapRouter:contentReference[oaicite:27]{index=27} (single-path swaps).
Updated Uniswap V3 router supporting multi-hop swaps and permit2:contentReference[oaicite:30]{index=30}.
Nonfungible Position Manager:contentReference[oaicite:33]{index=33} (Uniswap V3 LP positions as ERC-721 NFTs; includes mint/burn of liquidity positions).
Curve VotingEscrow (veCRV) contract proxy – time-locks CRV for voting power (not a pool).
Implementation for VotingEscrow (veCRV):contentReference[oaicite:38]{index=38}. Proxy target for locking CRV tokens.
Curve factory for metapools (deploys new StableSwap pools). Facilitates creating new Curve liquidity pools permissionlessly.
Curve factory for crypto pools (non-stable assets).
Example Curve V2 pool (TriCrypto):contentReference[oaicite:47]{index=47}; holds 3-crypto basket, one of largest pools on Ethereum.
Lido stETH token (rebasing) proxy contract:contentReference[oaicite:50]{index=50}. Users receive stETH upon staking ETH; balances update as rewards accrue.
Lido main staking contract (v2) – entry point for deposits:contentReference[oaicite:53]{index=53}. Accepts ETH and mints stETH; manages buffer & routing to node operators.
Lido Withdrawal Queue (ERC721):contentReference[oaicite:56]{index=56} contract for Shapella-enabled withdrawals. Issues unstETH NFTs representing pending withdrawals.
Rocket Pool’s rETH token (ERC-20) representing staked ETH:contentReference[oaicite:59]{index=59}. rETH appreciates as staking rewards accumulate.
Rocket Pool deposit contract:contentReference[oaicite:63]{index=63} – users send ETH here to mint rETH. Holds incoming ETH before assigning to node operators.
Rocket Pool core storage contract:contentReference[oaicite:66]{index=66}. Stores addresses of all Rocket Pool sub-contracts and config; acts as an on-chain registry.
Coinbase’s liquid staked ETH token (cbETH). ERC-20 wrapper for staked ETH:contentReference[oaicite:69]{index=69}; accrues rewards via increasing exchange rate.
Frax Ether token (frxETH):contentReference[oaicite:72]{index=72} – stable-value token minted 1:1 for each ETH staked into Frax’s LSD system. Can be further staked to earn yield.
Yield-bearing vault token (ERC-4626) for Frax ETH:contentReference[oaicite:75]{index=75}. Users stake frxETH into vault to receive sfrxETH, which accrues staking yield over time.
FRAX stablecoin (fractional-algorithmic USD):contentReference[oaicite:78]{index=78}. Supply expands/contracts via AMOs to hold $1 peg; backed by crypto collateral & governance.
DAI stablecoin (ERC-20) by MakerDAO:contentReference[oaicite:81]{index=81}. Soft-pegged to USD, generated by collateralized debt positions in Maker’s protocol.
Spark Protocol’s DAI lending pool (on Ethereum) – a MakerDAO-endorsed fork of Aave V3 for DAI lending:contentReference[oaicite:84]{index=84}. Integrates DAI Savings Rate for enhanced yield.
LUSD token by Liquity:contentReference[oaicite:87]{index=87} – USD-pegged stablecoin minted by fully ETH-collateralized loans (no governance). Redemption always possible for $1 of ETH.
Compound v2 Comptroller proxy – risk parameter manager & entry point for Compound markets. Each market’s interest rates & liquidity are controlled via this.
Compound v2 cUSDC market proxy (implementation cToken) – users supply USDC and receive cUSDC. Earns interest via increasing exchange rate.
Compound III (Comet) USDC market proxy. Isolated lending pool with USDC as base asset (supplied/borrowed) and multiple collateral assets.
